definition.name: Label
definition.purpose: Display a styled label for form elements
definition.description: A reusable UI component that renders a styled label using Radix UI's LabelPrimitive. It supports custom class names and passes all props to the underlying primitive. The label is visually styled for accessibility and disabled states.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the label

initial.data: No label text or children by default

enabled: All props supported by Radix LabelPrimitive.Root

when.description: The component is rendered with children

visible: Label text or children are visible

effects: Label is associated with a form element if used with htmlFor

when.description: The label is rendered in a disabled context (peer-disabled or group-data-[disabled=true])

visible: Label with normal opacity and pointer events
Label with reduced opacity and pointer events disabled

definition.visualLayout: A flex container with gap, font styling, and disabled state styles
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI LabelPrimitive.Root and applies custom utility classes for consistent styling. Accepts all props supported by the primitive.
